name: Wyndham at Waikiki Beach Walk

reviews.text: Lewers St. is the place to be in Waikiki.
reviews.title: Lewers Street Was The HighLight

reviews.text: It is very nicely redone with cool night time lighting, new palm trees and shrubry.
reviews.title: Outstanding Resort
Awesome Resort
reviews.text: It's kept very very clean, the contruction was all but done. In the evening you could either see free Hawiian entertainment many nights or hear the hawiian melodies from the nearby clubs/restraunts.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: New shops and bars, close to the beach, very safe with security and decent clientel around.
reviews.title: The Hawaii Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed along Lewers St. as far back as the 70's but now it is the highlight location of Waikiki for me.
reviews.title: Location, Location!

likes.disliked: — the view, external noise in the morning, pricey parking

aka: Wyndham At Waikiki Beach Walk Hotel Honolulu
